card.name: Sway of the Dark Church

card.name: The Carmichael Awards
card.text: Whenever you lose life for the first time each turn, network. (You get {star.png}. As a sorcery, spend 5 {star.png} to call in a favor.) When you call in a favor, if you've called in five favors this game, you win the game.

card.name: Armund, Wayward Killer
card.text: Whenever a permanent an opponent controls dies, put a loyalty counter on Armund, Wayward Killer. [+1]: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card. [-2]: Destroy target tapped creature. [-9]: Armund deals 9 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: Azamir, Among the Angels
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may cast a card exiled with Azamir without paying its mana cost. [+2]: Create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying. Exile the top card of your library. [-3]: Exile up to three cards you own from outside the game. [-4]: Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls. [-4]: Call in a favor.

card.name: Isamu, Hapless Researcher
card.text: [+1]: Mill three cards, then put a creature card from among them into your hand. [-2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle. [-6]: You get an emblem with "Tap an untapped creature you control: Return target creature card in your graveyard that shares a creature type with it to the battlefield."

card.name: Liactru, Big Damn Hero
card.text: [+1]: Liactru, Big Damn Hero deals 3 damage to any target. [-2]: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand, and the rest either on the bottom of your library in any order or into your graveyard. [-8]: Exile your library. You may cast any number of instant or sorcery cards exiled this way without paying their mana cost.

card.name: Mei, Soul of Discretion
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card, then discard a card unless your graveyard has seven or more cards in it. [-1]: Target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card revealed this way. They put that card into their library third from the top. [-6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, each opponent loses 1 life."

card.name: Mirai, Spring Breaking
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may play an additional land or activate another Planeswalker's loyalty abilities an additional time. [+1]: You may draw a card. If you do, each other player draws a card. [+1]: You may gain 3 life. If you do, each other player gains 3 life. [-7]: Return target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Nora, Actress in Waiting
card.text: [+1]: Untap up to one target land and up to one target nonland permanent. [0]: You may distribute a +1/+1 counter, loyalty counter, charge counter, and/or a lore counter among any number of permanents you control. [-6]: You get an emblem with "You may cast spells as copies of nonland permanents on the battlefield and nonland cards in graveyards."

card.name: An Accidental Anarchist
card.text: [0]: Each player creates a black enchantment token named Smog with "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life." [-2]: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. [-3]: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Ryan Opal Is...Calamity Smith
card.text: Whenever you activate one of Ryan Opal's abilities, you may discard a land card. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. [+2]: Create a Treasure token. [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn. [-2]: Ryan Opal deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Penelope, Spirit Caller
card.text: [+1]: Surveil 1. [-2]: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target sorcery card with total mana value 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand. [-3]: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Escape—{3}{U}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Rohith, Lost Rakshasa
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, put a loyalty counter on Rohith, Lost Rakshasa. [0]: Rohith becomes a 4/4 Cat creature with trample and hexproof until end of turn. (He doesn't lose loyalty as a creature) [-2]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to three target creatures. [-7]: Rohith deals 4 damage to up to two targets.

card.name: Roxy Robare, Nonstop
card.text: [+1]: Create two 1/1 red Rebel creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the end of turn. [-2]: You get an emblem with "Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0." [-6]: Until end of turn, whenever you cast a spell that targets, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Salo, Lax Missionary
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to its mana value, then put it into your hand. [-3]: Gain control of target creature as long as you control Salo. Put a defender counter on it. [-9]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a card is put into your hand from anywhere, create a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying."

card.name: Sihari, Location Consultant
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if mana from a Desert was spent to cast it, you may activate one of Sihari's loyalty abilities an additional time this turn. [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it is a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. [-2]: Create two 2/2 red Sand creature tokens.

card.name: Sindy, On Overdue Vacation
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, you gain 2 life. [-1]: You may play an additional land this turn.

card.name: Sonya, Technical Tourist
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card, then you may reveal it. If you don't reveal an artifact or planeswalker card this way, discard a card. [+1]: Untap up to one target land and up to one target nonland permanent. You gain 2 life. [-6]: Create a token that's a nonlegendary copy of another target permanent, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: Sylvia, Rabble Rouser
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn. Permanents cast this way gain haste until end of turn. [0]: Sylvia becomes a 2/2 Cat Warrior creature with indestructible, double strike, and haste until end of turn. [-3]: Destroy target artifact or nonbasic land.

card.name: Tove, Modern Curiosity
card.text: [+1]: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. [-2]: Tove deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of differently named lands you control. [-6]: Until end of turn, you may play any number of lands. You draw up to five cards and lose that much life.

card.name: Jessica, In Her Element
card.text: Once each turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 1, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. [+1]: Jessica deals 2 damage to each opponent. [-2]: Draw two cards, then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.

card.name: Vande, Ruthless Critic
card.text: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control with power 2 or less. [-2]: Exile target nonland legendary permanent. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Twice each turn, whenever a permanent you control dies, you may return it to the battlefield tapped."
